backend/main.mo: Defines game types, user profiles, lobbies, authorization checks, and functions for profile management and lobby creation with access control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Documents evidence for implementing Google Search Console verification via a specific static HTML file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Applies Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for color tokens and UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/google79d2180f87c8c2c7.h: Static file containing the Google Search Console verification string.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the application with the theme provider and layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders an Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal for first-time users to set a display name and saves the profile to the backend.
Displays a countdown timer based on a start time and duration, updating every second with urgency styling.
Shows the list of players in a lobby with host indication in a styled terminal-themed panel.
frontend/src/components/game/TerminalPan: Implements an interactive terminal UI with command history, autocomplete, and output rendering for game challenges.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header, navigation, footer, and themed styling.
frontend/src/constants/appVersion.ts: Exports the application's version string as a shared constant.
frontend/src/content/updates.ts: Provides structured changelog data for the Updates page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and handles query invalidation on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Wraps useActor to expose a simple readiness flag for the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including profiles, lobbies, matches, and command processing with a simulation fallback.
frontend/src/index.css: Contains Tailwind-based global styles and custom terminal-inspired theme effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers applied.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with solo and multiplayer options, handles lobby creation, and displays feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the global leaderboard and recent matches, with optional authentication prompts.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Manages lobby state including joining, leaving, starting matches, copying lobby codes, and polling lobby updates.
frontend/src/pages/MatchPage.tsx: Runs the active match view, processes terminal commands, tracks completion, and redirects to results when finished.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Shows final score and mode after a match and provides navigation back to solo mode or the main menu.
frontend/src/pages/SoloGamePage.tsx: Initializes and runs a solo match by creating a lobby, starting the game, handling commands, and computing score.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Renders the updates log page, listing versioned updates with titles, dates, and change details using a styled terminal-like UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the app’s terminal-style theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the hacking‑style game.
